definition: what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
pinyin: yan3 bu4 jian4 , xin1 bu4 fan2

definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
